alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:52AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow today. Additional accumulations of 5 to 12 inches below 6500 feet, and 12 to 24 inches above 6500 feet. Amounts near 3 feet are expected across the Bear River Range. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph, creating low visibility...including localized whiteout conditions. * WHERE...Inkom, McCammon, Downey, Lava Hot Springs, Fish Creek Summit, Emigration Summit, Grace, Soda Springs, Henry, Bone, Wayan, and Swan Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially today. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
